meal.note: Falafel wrap with arugula, cabbage, cucumbers and herbed thick sour cream

meal.note: Housemade semolina pudding with apple sauce

meal.note: Housemade vegane brownies with peanut butter

meal.name: Grüne Suppe von der Erbse mit Croutons
meal.note: Green pea soup with croutons

meal.name: Rinderroulade vom Hohenloher Rind mit Serviettenknödel und Gewürzrotkohl
meal.note: Beef roulade with bread dumplings and spiced red cabbage

meal.name: Geschmorter Stängelkohl mit roter Paprika vom Grill, dazu Gnocchi mit Tomaten-Basilikumpesto

meal.note: Housemade chia-pudding with fruit

meal.note: Herbed cauliflower soup

meal.note: Lentil ragout with poultry sausage and fresh spaetzle noodles

meal.note: Yogurt with nuts and cereal

meal.note: Housemade salted caramel creme

meal.note: Coloful lentil stew with vegetables
